name: map_TrackID
description: Maps the track file (*.trk) output of 3dTrackID to another space using the 1Dmatrix_save info of 3dAllineate.
author: AFNI Developers

inputs.name: Output prefix
inputs.description: Prefix for the output track file.

inputs.name: Input track file
inputs.description: The name of the *.trk file to be mapped.

inputs.name: Input map file
inputs.description: Single line of matrix values for the transformation.

inputs.name: Reference file
inputs.description: 3D data set in the space to which the TRK file is being mapped.

inputs.name: Zero origin
inputs.description: Put (0,0,0) as the origin in the output *.trk file.

inputs.name: Line only numbers
inputs.description: If your 1D_MATR file is just 12 numbers in a row.

inputs.name: Already inverted transformation
inputs.description: If you have inverted the mapping or use another program than 3dAllineate.

output-files.name: Output track file
output-files.description: Mapped track file to new space
